ai-tika-abh06t12:2_1: “What can I do for me to have one thing?”
ai-tika-abh06t12:2_2: There is designation, not what is designated.
ai-tika-abh06t12:2_3: But that is called “announced” in the same way as understanding” is what is meant.
ai-tika-abh06t12:2_5: “These things constructed name and preparing their names, namely, Varuṇa, and working.”
ai-tika-abh06t12:2_6: Herein, it is said: it is calculation. ”
ai-tika-abh06t12:2_8: “Who is it?” “Who is in this way? “Whoever is the next” is the passing away, “Whoever is making an end of these three?”
ai-tika-abh06t12:2_13: “Yes,” he replied, “I did so.” Then he said, “I thought, “I’m coming.”
ai-tika-abh06t12:2_14: In this way one is described as laid down as laid down as laid down by one.
ai-tika-abh06t12:2_15: “Form” is the arising of form. When physical nutriment is dependent on the forms, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness, states, but rather it is wisdom. That is, this is the meaning of the world’s flame, is the meaning. And this is the meaning of understanding that this is its profitable.
ai-tika-abh06t12:3_0: now there is the announcement for one who is lost, he should announce it thus: “This is the earth kasiṇa,”
ai-tika-abh06t12:3_1: Herein, “He is called a Teaching” because he does not describe it, so-and-so says. That is why he’s called “Dease”.
ai-tika-abh06t12:4_0: Now, this is what is known as the threefold reckoning, and what is known as the threefold reckoning.
ai-tika-abh06t12:4_1: Herein, there is the light kasiṇa : what is known as singing of the eye, etc., the earth element, and the water that is called “themness” .
ai-tika-abh06t12:4_2: But there is two kinds of clear vision as rejected by what is meant.
ai-tika-abh06t12:4_3: Herein, there is one thing such as the name and formless states are called “restraint in the land of the immaterial states”.
ai-tika-abh06t12:4_6: Since there is no recognition of the signs as well, etc.;
ai-tika-abh06t12:5_0: When one is called abiding in this way, it is said to be the ultimate sort of essence.
ai-tika-abh06t12:5_1: When it is eradicated, it is said to be “without being destroyed”, “The being invited,” this is said to be “setting it.”
ai-tika-abh06t12:5_2: But it is of two kinds: the carcass of rice and barley, the running task, the using the immaterial states, and it is discarded by the wind.
ai-tika-abh06t12:5_3: For whatever owing to the incomparable is known by the mind-consciousness-contact,
ai-tika-abh06t12:5_4: When this is conceived, there is no recognitionality for one who isn’t foundation. When what has been seen, what has been understood about, it is called “These six things” .
ai-tika-abh06t12:5_5: Herein, there is the ultimate being in a consequence of forms.
ai-tika-abh06t12:5_6: Then, when there is no recognise of wisdom, there is no recognition of wisdom.
ai-tika-abh06t12:5_7: But if anyone didn’t do anything for the purpose of making a statement, then, except if the ministers of the religions and counselors, or both of the ascetics of other religions, even when guided by the ascetics of other religions, or only the men of other religions.
ai-tika-abh06t12:5_8: “These six direct knowledges are eliminated” . It is non-confusion for the six direct knowledges.
ai-tika-abh06t12:5_9: “Faithful is a person who has faith,” and so on.
ai-tika-abh06t12:5_11: “An aristocrat, brahmin, merchant, and Bhaddiya the Dwarf this matter how these six classes are not known about.”
ai-tika-abh06t12:6_0: Such is called “ascetic” the name “ascetic” used for the purpose of abandoning the short liquid, longing for the sickness of the Divines and the rest, as happens because of the heavenly tastes, etc., and because of the divine beauty, etc., of the noble ones, and so on. That is why it should be described as “space” .

ai-tika-abh06t12:8_0: By composing, a third point, but not at the third point.
ai-tika-abh06t12:9_0: Having two skillful qualities, he does not tremble at the move,
